Package it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel

Class LeaderCard

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.View.ReducedModel.RedLeaderCard
it.polimi.ingsw.Model.GameModel.LeaderCard
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
public class LeaderCard
extends RedLeaderCard
There are 4 types of Leader Card, depending on the type of special effect they apply on the Game. All of them have the following attributes: a CardId for identification, victoryPoints for the score. Type is a byte identifying the type
See Also:

    • discard

      public void discard() throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
      Sets "discarded" to true if the card is not already discarded nor active.
      Throws:
      java.lang.IllegalArgumentException - if the card was already discarded or active.
